title: Nwada001
author: Nwada001
content: QuoteThe Atiku Solution, a campaign support group working for the victory of Alhaji Atiku Abubakar, the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), has called on the party to take a decisive action on Rivers State Governor Nyesom Wike.Speaking in Yenagoa, Bayelsa State capital, on Saturday, the Deputy Chairman, The Atiku Solution (TAS), Mr Christopher Abarowei, said the party is supreme hence Wike should respect the party, its leadership and right of other persons. Abarowei, who is also a member of the Elders’ Council of the Ijaw National Congress (INC), therefore urged the National Working Committee (NWC) of the PDP to act immediately and caution Wike either persuasively or wield the punitive stick of sanction on him either by suspension or expulsion from the PDP.Why will these two people be having issues with each other when they are supposed to be on the same page? The reason being that they are in the same political party (PDP). This motion they move against Wike by the Atiku campaign committee, I believe, is because of the dismissal of the approved site for the presidential candidate campaign, which was scheduled to hold on the 14th of February 2023. According to the River State Governor, his claims for the cancellation were based on the information he received that the proposed site was going to be used by both the PDP and APC political parties and that it would result in campaign violence, etc. To me, I believe that from the start, the River State Governor was never going to support his political party's choice of representative for the presidential candidate. There are photos and videos of the River's State Governor parading along side the Labour Party's presidential candidate, Peter Obi, which many are saying he is indirectly campaigning for the opposing political party.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: I was opportune to listen to one of governor Wike's interview and how he vehemently lamented that the only reason why he distance himself from PDP national is as a result of how unfair and bias the organizers of the PDP National presidential primary was which gave room to Atiku Abubaka as the flag bearer of the party, which he nurtured for several years as Atiku fled away from the party, only for him to come back and results manipulated for his favour simply because he is a Northerner while excluding all other regions for the two top most important position of a political party (I.e Party National chairman and the Presidential candidate)

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: To me wike is fighting for his right based on his own interest, it's normal that if the presidential candidate of PDP should be from the north then the national party chairman should come from the south, so why are they changing the narratives now, national party chairman is from the north and the presidential candidate too is from the north, I think that's the reason why wike is angry, because the major two offices of PDP have been drafted to the north, so the Atiku group and and wike group should come together and iron things out for themselves, if not PDP will lose the election at the federal level, they should forget about suspension and make peace within themselves, that's my say though..Las Las na peter obi I dey kuku support, PDP matter no even concern me

Wike is a leader on his own and don't care about who you are or how much you have because in his own state,he is the number one and does things with force,regardless of who you are. We all saw these when Ameachi was the governor of River state. Ekwere is partially from the East and the blood is still there,Peter Obi will not leave his brother and support those northerns who are been sentimental in their decisions when it comes to power. Mr Christopher Abatowei is confused and carried away with the little money he is benefiting from Atiku,where was Mr Christopher at 2014 election that Atiku wanted Goodluck Jonathan the incubant president to step down for him in PDP primary, which Johnathan refused and Atiku got angry,left PDP and went to APC to work for Buhari against Goodluck Jonathan.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on February 12, 2023, 08:33:16 AMThere are photos and videos of the River's State Governor parading along side the Labour Party's presidential candidate, Peter Obi, which many are saying he is indirectly campaigning for the opposing political party.Wike has a right to support a candidate of his choice, and also has the right to not feel happy with his political party. If he is suspended from the Party, It will not stop his political career or reduce his political relevance. He will simply move to another party, and continue from there. Personally I dey reason say Wike still get e presidential aspiration for mind, so he is playing it safe both with APC candidate and LP candidate wey e know say people like normally. PDP loose better thing as dem loose Wike support, he is a very influential politician.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: The Nigeria’s general election is just days away in what is going to be the most decisive general elections the country has had in a long time, I think it would be a make or break election for the country.Three parties are the forerunners and that’s PDP, APC and LP. But we have seen in the build up to the election that their has been unrest in the parties of PDP where we see some of the governors under that umbrella not actually supporting their candidate which I think it’s a selfless act and on the other hand we can see the problem between the present president who is an APC member having some disagreement with APC candidate.

comments.body: All these problems wey d happen between Atiku and Wike, no be because Atiku no gree pick Wike as em vice under the flag of the PDP presidential candidate. Ortom the support Obi. Makinde the support Tinubu. Ikpeazu the support Atiku and the last person wey be Ugwuanyi d confused on whom to support. comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on February 12, 2023, 08:33:16 AMThere are photos and videos of the River's State Governor parading along side the Labour Party's presidential candidate, Peter Obi, which many are saying he is indirectly campaigning for the opposing political party.This is a wrong assumption, before making such a claim, do not forget that peter Obi was a member of the PDP and was also a very good friend to Nyesom Wike before he(Peter Obi) left PDP for Labour party.Personally, many or most of the videos and photos I've seen online that shows both of them(Nyesom Wike and Peter Obi) together are photos dated way back when Peter Obi was still a member of PDP and possibly the Anambra state governor.But this aside, Wike is one stubborn man, and I see him as a bone in the throat of the PDP, he's one that have a strong foundation in PDP  and I personally do not think suspending him would be that easy.
